title: Remove registry package references for .NET Core
body: I recently (#427) turned off the use-registry flag entirely for our .NET Core flavor. But I didn't remove the `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` package references, and the (generated) nuspecs still declare a dependency on it.

nodes.body: Looks like this was resolved between #475 and 18b79b28eaba635d7621bf5b8ddca68706e341bc.
